definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: China's Ministry of Finance has allocated $123 million in aid for quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 中國財政部已經爲災區撥出一億兩千三百萬救災款。

sentences.english: His government to the village of intercepting any type, bought sapling and grass seeds.
sentences.chinese: 他截流了政府給村裏的救災款，買了樹苗和草籽。
